name: SPARKPLUG
description:
SPARK PLUG (noun) - informal. a person who leads, inspires, or animates a group.

you take the wheel of the ATLANTIS MK III, the most technologically advanced vehicle the revolution has in its possession, as you battle your way through HORDES OF ENEMIES. just remember... DON'T SLOW DOWN.

wasd/arrow keys to move
space to dash
m to mute
esc to quit

made by cherrycolouredbracelets and dextron12 for lowrezjam 2020
